com.github.timia2109.jcron

Class IntervaledObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.timia2109.jcron.TimeInterval
      • com.github.timia2109.jcron.IntervaledObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CronTask, IntervallSchedule

    public abstract class IntervaledObject
extends TimeInterval
implements CronTask
    A IntervaledObject to create tasks like "every 5 minutes"

    • Method Detail

      • restart

        public boolean restart()
        Description copied from interface: CronTask
        Returns if this task should be repeated. When it should repeated then calculate the next execution time in this method! Runs always in JCron Thread
        Specified by:
        restart in interface CronTask
        Returns:
        true, if this task should be repeated!

      • getNextTime

        public long getNextTime()
        Description copied from interface: CronTask
        Return the time mills when this task should executed. This value should only changed in constructor, in method restart() or before calling JCron.getInstance().reorder()
        Run always in JCron Thread
        Specified by:
        getNextTime in interface CronTask
        Returns:
        Timemills for the next execution

      • exec

        public abstract void exec()
        Description copied from interface: CronTask
        Executes the task.
        May executed in new Thread or in JCron Thread
        Specified by:
        exec in interface CronTask
